revision.comment: The noattack flag does have a named constant.
revision.text: <noinclude>The following are the sector flags available in [[UDMF]] and in the [[Sector_ChangeFlags]] action.</noinclude> {| {{prettytable}} !Identifier constant!!Value!!UDMF name!!Description |- |SECF_SILENT||1||{{c|silent}}||Actors do not emit any sound within this sector. |- |SECF_NOFALLINGDAMAGE||2||{{c|nofallingdamage}}||Falling damage is disabled on this sector's floor. |- |SECF_FLOORDROP||4||{{c|dropactors}}||All actors standing on this floor will remain on it when it lowers very fast. |- |SECF_NORESPAWN||8||{{c|norespawn}}||Players cannot respawn in this sector. |- |SECF_FRICTION||16|||N/A||[[Friction]] is enabled on the sector. |- |SECF_PUSH||32||N/A||[[Carrying sector|Pushers]] are enabled on the sector. |- |SECF_SILENTMOVE||64||N/A||Sector's movement makes no sound. |- |SECF_DMGTERRAINFX||128||{{c|damageterraineffect}}||A [[TERRAIN|terrain]] splash is spawned at the end of each damage interval. |- |SECF_DMGENDGODMODE||256||N/A||Getting damaged by the sector ends ''god'' mode. |- |SECF_DMGENDLEVEL||512||N/A||Being in the sector ends the level when [[health]] goes below 10 points. |- |SECF_DMGHAZARD||1024||{{c|damagehazard}}||Changes the damage model of the sector to ''[[Strife]]'''s delayed damage. |- |SECF_NOATTACK||2048||{{c|noattack}}||Monsters in this sector do not attack. |} <noinclude>[[Category:Editing references]]</noinclude>
